name: Sadist
description:
You have the power to Inflict Pain. At the start of any regroup phase (before the offense retrieves a ship from the warp), use this power to win the game if all other players have lost at least eight ships each. Lost ships include ships in the warp, ships removed from the game, and ships captured by other players.
You may still win the game via the normal method.
Do not use with Zombie or Healer
lore: A civilization that glorifies pain and pleasure in primal, brutal rituals, the Sadists barely manage to keep their own race alive. Desiring to spread their brand of worship across the Universe, these being enter the Cosmos with peering eyes, blood on their hands, and the desire to kill as many living things as possible.

wild.description: When you send another player's ships to the warp, you may draw one card from the deck for each player who lost ships to you.

super_flare.description: At the start of any encounter, you may choose a player with at least one ship in the warp (even yourself) and any other player. The first player retrieves a ship from the warp, then the other player sends one of his or her ships (his or her choice) to the warp.

edits: Edited for wording consistency and clarity.
